data.name: DARK MINUTE: Kira's Adventure Demo
data.detailed_description:
Demo version of Dark Minute: Kira's Adventure!

Do you like challenges? Will you help Kira to find answers for her questions? Explore the mysterious technology in a thrilling platformer. Face up to hundreds of prepared challenges, discover the terrible secrets of the hero's past and... humanity, and learn a great secret. A game from the creator of two board games.

A single player narrative gameplay in a retro dark tale of exploring an alternative history of humanity and the main character.

Demo content:
  • 5 dark levels.
  • After 60 seconds the light turns off...
  • You need to find 3 energy cells to open the exit.
  • How the gameplay will go? Will you discover all secrets? Depends only on you!

If you like it - buy the full version of our game!

data.short_description: Demo version of Dark Minute: Kira's Adventure! Do you like challenges? Will you help Kira to find answers for her questions? Explore the mysterious technology in a thrilling platformer. The demo version has 5 dark levels to check the game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
